author: arj
msg: Thanks to the magic of XyleScope, the default jspwiki.css gets some small tweaks to make the overall styles a bit more aesthetically pleasing and consistent.

author: arj
msg: Build.xml gets some stub code for HTTP/web unit testing. There aren't any tests just yet, but we do have a snappy Tomcat auto-deploy mechanism now.

author: arj
msg: Bugfix for XMLUserDatabase that caused funny auth problems if the jspwiki.properties userdatabase prop was commented out. (Credit: Janne)

author: arj
msg: Favorites/PageActions get context-sensitive "Log in" "Logout" and "Create group" links.
